Interface MidiEventFactory

All Known Implementing Classes:
LegatoMidiEventFactory, StaccatoMidiEventFactory, StandardMidiEventFactory
public interface MidiEventFactory
Interface for creating MIDI events using the Factory pattern. Provides methods to create Note On and Note Off MIDI events with specific parameters.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    MidiEvent
    createNoteOff(int tick, int note, int channel)
    Creates a Note Off MIDI event.
    MidiEvent
    createNoteOn(int tick, int note, int velocity, int channel)
    Creates a Note On MIDI event.

  • Method Details

    • createNoteOn

      MidiEvent createNoteOn(int tick, int note, int velocity, int channel) throws InvalidMidiDataException
      Creates a Note On MIDI event.
      Parameters:
      tick - The time in ticks when the note starts
      note - The MIDI note number (0-127)
      velocity - The velocity (volume) of the note (0-127)
      channel - The MIDI channel (0-15)
      Returns:
      A MIDI event for the Note On message
      Throws:
      InvalidMidiDataException - If any parameter is invalid for MIDI specification

    • createNoteOff

      MidiEvent createNoteOff(int tick, int note, int channel) throws InvalidMidiDataException
      Creates a Note Off MIDI event.
      Parameters:
      tick - The time in ticks when the note ends
      note - The MIDI note number (0-127) to turn off
      channel - The MIDI channel (0-15)
      Returns:
      A MIDI event for the Note Off message
      Throws:
      InvalidMidiDataException - If any parameter is invalid for MIDI specification
